test_message: Create engagement message for: Candidate: John Martinez, Score: 85/100, Role: Data Scientist, Match reasons: 7 years Python/ML experience, PhD in Statistics, worked at top AI labs. Seniority: Senior level.
validation_errors: Response is not valid JSON: Expecting value: line 1 column 1 (char 0)

actual_response.raw_text:
Here is a personalized engagement message for John Martinez:

```json
{
  "status": "success",
  "result": {
    "message_type": "email",
    "subject": "Exciting Opportunity for a Data Scientist at Our Company",
    "body": "Dear John,\n\nI hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out to discuss an exciting opportunity that I believe would be an excellent match with your impressive background in data science. \n\nWith your 7 years of hands-on experience in Python and machine learning, along with your PhD in Statistics, you have a deep technical foundation that is perfectly suited for the challenges we aim to tackle at our company. Your contributions to top AI labs are particularly noteworthy, showcasing your ability to innovate and excel in high-impact environments.\n\nWe are looking for a Data Scientist who can drive complex projects and create groundbreaking solutions, much like your past endeavors. We'd love to discuss how your expertise can contribute to our team and further your career.\n\nCould we schedule a time to speak? Please let me know your availability this week. I am eager to explore how we can align our goals.\n\nLooking forward to your response.\n\nBest regards,\n\n[Your Name] \n[Your Contact Information]",
    "tone_used": "professional",
    "personalization_points": ["7 years experience in Python and machine learning", "PhD in Statistics", "worked at top AI labs"],
    "call_to_action": "Could we schedule a time to speak? Please let me know your availability this week.",
    "sent_status": "pending"
  },
  "metadata": {"agent_name": "Candidate Engagement Agent", "timestamp": "2023-11-01T12:00:00Z"}
}
```

This email highlights John's extensive experience and qualifications, emphasizing how these align with the role's requirements. The call-to-action encourages scheduling a conversation to discuss the opportunity further.
